Imports

../core, ../components/private/tracking, ../components/private/global_state, ../types, validations, operations, contexts, private

Procs

proc ed[T](value: T): EdValue[T]
Convenience constructor for EdValue. Creates an Ed container holding the given value. Example: let name = ed("hello") 
proc init(_: type Ed; K, V: type; flags = DEFAULT_FLAGS; ctx = ctx(); id = "";
          op_ctx = OperationContext()): EdTable[K, V]
proc init(_: type Ed; T: type[ref | object | array | SomeOrdinal | SomeNumber];
          flags = DEFAULT_FLAGS; ctx = ctx(); id = "";
          op_ctx = OperationContext()): Ed[T, T]
proc init(_: type; T: type[string]; flags = DEFAULT_FLAGS; ctx = ctx(); id = "";
          op_ctx = OperationContext()): Ed[string, string]
proc init(T: type Ed; flags = DEFAULT_FLAGS; ctx = ctx(); id = "";
          op_ctx = OperationContext()): T:type
Initialize an empty Ed container of the given type. 
proc init[K, V](_: type Ed; T: type Table[K, V]; flags = DEFAULT_FLAGS;
                ctx = ctx(); id = ""; op_ctx = OperationContext()): Ed[
    Table[K, V], Pair[K, V]]
proc init[K, V](_: type Ed; tracked: Table[K, V]; flags = DEFAULT_FLAGS;
                ctx = ctx(); id = ""; op_ctx = OperationContext()): EdTable[K, V]

             id = ""; op_ctx = OperationContext()): Ed[seq[O], O]
proc init[O](_: type Ed; T: type set[O]; flags = DEFAULT_FLAGS; ctx = ctx();
             id = ""; op_ctx = OperationContext()): Ed[set[O], O]
proc init[O](_: type Ed; tracked: seq[O]; flags = DEFAULT_FLAGS; ctx = ctx();
             id = ""; op_ctx = OperationContext()): Ed[seq[O], O]
proc init[O](_: type Ed; tracked: set[O]; flags = DEFAULT_FLAGS; ctx = ctx();

proc init[T, O](self: var Ed[T, O]; flags = DEFAULT_FLAGS; ctx = ctx(); id = "";
                op_ctx = OperationContext())
proc init[T: ref | object | tuple | array | SomeOrdinal | SomeNumber | string |
    ptr](_: type Ed; tracked: T; flags = DEFAULT_FLAGS; ctx = ctx(); id = "";
         op_ctx = OperationContext()): Ed[T, T]
proc init_ed_fields[T: object or ref](self: T; flags = DEFAULT_FLAGS;
                                      ctx = ctx()): T {.discardable.}
Initialize all Ed fields on an object. Call after creating an object with Ed fields. 
proc init_from[T: object or ref](_: type T; src: T; ctx = ctx()): T {.
    discardable.}
Create an object by looking up Ed fields from a source object in a different context.

Macros

macro bootstrap(_: type Ed): untyped
Initialize the Ed runtime. Call once at application startup before creating Ed containers.
